channel.title: Wishing Tutorial
channel.description:
Well if i can remember, ages ago there used to be a tut on wishing were you would make a file and put it in ur source file and people would say like ::wish (whatever thay want) and it would appear in the file,
Could someone make me a tut of this or give me the tutorial url
Thanks[br][size=1]Posted on: June 02, 2007, 12:12:35 PM[/size][hr]Please! help me!

item.title: Wishing Tutorial
item.dc:creator: @LeScape_Pk LeScape Pk
item.description:
@LeScape_Pk wrote:

Like a suggestion?
add this command

if(command.startsWith("suggest"))  {
      sendMessage("Sending...");
	sendMessage("Suggestion Succesfully Sent To The LeCaverns Staff!");
	BufferedWriter bw = null;
String suggestion = command.substring(8);
try {
         bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("suggestions.txt", true));
	bw.write(playerName+": "+suggestion);
	bw.newLine();
	bw.flush();
      } catch (IOException ioe) {
	ioe.printStackTrace();
      } finally {
	if (bw != null) try {
     bw.close();
	} catch (IOException ioe2) {
     sendMessage("Error Suggesting");
	}
      }
}

and in your server folder create a new text document named
“suggestions”

Read full topic
